greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of sigma(8*n^2)/sigma(4*n^2).
comment: The sequence is not periodic, values of numerators are always -1+2^s.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) for (n=1, 1000, a=numerator(sigma(8*n^2)/sigma(4*n^2)); write("b065915.txt", n, " ", a)) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 04 2009
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 28 2001
